config.NAME: DLR_AMPS
config.CONFIG: (MRID VARCHAR, VALUE DOUBLE, QUALITY INTEGER, TIME VARCHAR) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='scada-line-amps', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON')

config.NAME: SCADA_AMPS
config.CONFIG: AS SELECT MRID, LATEST_BY_OFFSET(VALUE) AS VALUE_LATEST, LATEST_BY_OFFSET(QUALITY) AS QUALITY_LATEST, LATEST_BY_OFFSET(TIME) AS TIME_LATEST FROM DLR_AMPS GROUP BY MRID EMIT CHANGES
